Class HumanPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Player
      • main.HumanPlayer

  • public class HumanPlayer
extends Player
    A human Player Subclass. Contains methods to take user input and turn it into a Location.
    Author:
    james

    • Method Detail

      • selectStart

        public Location selectStart()
        Accessor Method to take user input and return a valid Location on the board.

        This method handles both selection of a Piece and selection of where to move it. Extra checks apply if the Player is selecting a Piece to move.

        Specified by:
        selectStart in class Player
        Parameters:
        pieceSelection - whether the Player is selecting its Piece to move or not.
        Returns:
        Location of a Random Piece that can be moved.
